hata_min_ram: RAM must be at least 4 MB.
hata_min_disk: Disk size must be at least 100 MB.
hata_iso_gerekli: You must select an ISO file.
silme_onayı: Are you sure you want to delete the virtual machine named
vm_sürükleme: VM Dragging: You can drag 💻 icons on the map to place them where you want.
sağ_tık_menü: Right-Click Menu: Right-click a VM icon to quickly perform actions like Start, Stop, Snapshot, Settings, or Delete.
yeni_vm_oluşturma: Create New VM: Click the ➕ Add button in the top menu to create a new VM step by step (requires an ISO file).
silme_modu_açıklama: Delete Mode: After clicking the 🗑 Delete button, click a VM icon to open the delete confirmation window.
tema_değiştir: View / Theme: Click the 👁 View button to toggle between light and dark modes.
rdp_bağlantısı: RDP Connection: Double-clicking on a VM starts a Remote Desktop (RDP) connection, depending on VirtualBox settings.
esc_kapat: ESC Key: Press Esc to close all open modals and windows.
nat_açıklama: (Black line) VM can only access the internet. It cannot communicate with other VMs directly.
natnetwork_açıklama: (Red line) VMs can access the internet and communicate with each other on the same NAT Network.
bridged_açıklama: (Green line) VM connects directly to the physical network. It can access internet and LAN like a real device.
vm_simgeleri_sürüklenebilir: All VM icons are draggable and their positions persist after refresh.
harita_sürükleme: You can drag the map by holding and moving on an empty area (like Google Maps).
otomatil_güncelleme: VM statuses update automatically every 5 seconds.
tema_geçiş_uyumu: Theme changes apply instantly and all components adapt accordingly.
kısayol_sağ_tık: 🖱 Right-click → “▶ Start / ⏹ Stop / ⚙ Settings / 📸 Snapshot / 🗑 Delete”
kısayol_ekle: ➕ Add → Create new VM with ISO file
kısayol_esc: 🧭 ESC → Close all open windows quickly
server_error: Server error: Failed to submit settings.
